structure.unit: B LICENSURE AND REGULATION OF HEALTH FACILITIES AND SERVICES

law.catch_line: Actions of cabinet to be in writing and of record.
law.text: Every order, decision, finding, license, or certificate issued or approved by the cabinet under any of the provisions of this chapter shall be in writing and shall be entered on the records of the cabinet.
law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 371, sec. 42, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 512, PT. 7, sec. 28, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 210, sec. 11, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 347, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 135, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1980.
